11317.title: Scadutree Fragment
11317.info: Scadutree Fragments can be consumed to bolster your Scadutree Blessing, which increases your Attack Power and Damage Negation in the Shadow Realm.

5677.title: Crystal Tear
5677.info: **How to use:** At any Site of Grace, combine with another Crystal Tear in the [Flask of Wondrous Physique](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=164723). Lasts for 3 minutes unless otherwise noted.

5679.title: Larval Tear
5679.info: **Utility:** Trade to [Rennala](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=165895) to gain rebirth and reallocate attribute points.

5687.title: Spirit Ashes
5687.info:
**Spirit Ashes** are summonable companions, that can aid the player in combat. After receiving the [Spirit Calling Bell](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=167800), the player may summon any acquired Spirit Ash by paying its cost when in range of a Rebirth Monument.

After completing Roderika's Task, [Roderika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232) can upgrade any Spirit Ash with the corresponding upgrade material, up to +10.

5702.title: Glovewort
5702.info:
**Utility:** Give to [Roderika](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-lands-between?locationIds=170232) to upgrade Spirit Ashes.  
- A Grave Glovewort [X] upgrades a standard Spirit Ash to +X.
- A Ghost Glovewort [X] upgrades an elite Spirit Ash to +X.

locations.title: Fire Knight Hilde
locations.description:
**Location:** On a ledge jutting out from the wall at the very top of the loft area. To get to it, follow these steps:
1. Send the elevator closest to the wall down, stepping back onto the platform so you don't descend with it.
2. Wait for the elevator furthest from the wall to ascend, then do the same thing — sending it down and stepping back to stay on the platform.
3. Quickly hurry over to the first elevator and jump down onto the top of the elevator as it's ascending.
4. Carefully jump from the top of the elevator onto the ledge.

locations.title: Spelldrake Talisman +3

locations.description:
**Location:** In the chest inside the tower entrance   
**Effect:** Raises arcane

locations.title: Arrow's Soaring Sting Talisman
locations.description:
**Location:** On top of the tallest tower in the [Fog Rift Fort](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381507).  First find your way inside the fort, then drop down the cliff via the small gap east of the building with the [Black Knight Garrew](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381539) and climb to the top of the tower   
**Effect:** Increases the effective range of bows and raises attack power of arrows and bolts

locations.title: Pearldrake Talisman +3

Only accessible after pulling the [Specimen Level](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381729)

locations.title: Boltdrake Talisman +3

locations.title: Stone-Sheathed Sword
locations.description:
**Location:** [Fog Rift Catacombs](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381172) - From the [Ash of War: Blinkbolt](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382154), turn around and walk across the spiked ceiling to an alcove on the right. The weapon sits on a stone altar.  
**Type:** Straight Sword  
**Weapon Skill:** Square Off

**Note:** This weapon can be upgraded to either the [Sword of Darkness](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382161) or the [Sword of Light](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382518). You may change freely between the two versions by returning to their respective altars.

locations.title: Sword of Darkness
locations.description:
**Location:** Inside the [Ruins of Unte](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382011)  
**Type:** Straight Sword  
**Weapon Skill:** Darkness

**Note:** This location is an altar that upgrades the [Stone-Sheathed Sword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382155) to the Sword of Darkness. If you find this location first, then the Stone-Sheathed Sword and Sword of Darkness locations will swap. If you obtain the [Sword of Light](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382518), you may return here to turn it back into the Sword of Darkness.

**Location:** At the end of a platforming puzzle.  Enter the settlement from Enir-Ilim north of the location, starting at the Spiral Rise site of grace.  
**Type:** Twinblade  
**Weapon Skill:** Euporia Vortex - Using the power of the vortex, violently twirl the armament, dealing multiple slashes directly ahead. The greater the restored luster of blades, the greater the power of this skill. However, use of this skill will fully consume the blades' luster. Luster is restored passively through damaging foes.

**Location:** Follow Ansbach's questline and summon him once for the fight against Promised Consort Radahn  
**Type:** Scythe  
**Weapon Skill:** Dynastic Sickleplay

A finessed evasive skill that creates space to maneuver. Inputs dictated direction of the backstep. Follow up with strong attack to perform an advancing upward slash. Press strong attack again to bring the weapon back down.

locations.title: Queelign
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Once you open the room with the [Prayer Room Key](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381928), Queelign will be found on the floor praying to Marika.

You can choose to give him either:

1. The [Iris of Grace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381354), and receive the [Fire Knight Queelign](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382894) Spirit Ashes.

2. Or give him one of the 3 [Iris of Occultation](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381817)s, and receive [Queelign's Greatsword](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382893).

**Important:** As the [Iris of Grace](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381354) is only found once and therefore limited compared to the 3 Iris of Occulation and being able to use them on [Jolán](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382004) too, you may want to consider which Iris of Grace reward you want to obtain.

locations.title: Leda's Questline (1st battle)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the center of the bridge. After progressing through [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), two summon signs will appear.  
**Helping Leda:**
- Ends [Hornsent's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387464)
- Progresses [Needle Knight Leda's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453)
- [Falx](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387421)
- [Hornsent's Armor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387458)

**Helping Hornsent:**
- Ends [Needle Knight Leda's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), except the last step.
- [Ash of War: Swift Slash](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387459)
- [Leda's Rune](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387460)

**Helping neither (skipping the fight):**
- Progresses [Leda's Questline (1st battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381987). **ONLY IF** Hornsent is summoned against [Messmer the Impaler](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381741)

locations.title: Leda's Questline (2nd battle)
locations.description:
**Location:** In the back room of [Storehouse, First Floor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381345). After progressing through [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), two summon signs will appear:   
**Helping Leda:**
- Progresses [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453)
- Ends [Sir Ansbach's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387468)
- [Ansbach's Longbow](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387462)
- [Ansbach's Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=386515)

**Helping Ansbach:**
- Ends [Needle Knight Leda's questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387453), except the last step.
- [Ansbach's Longbow](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387462)
- [Leda's Rune](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387460)

**Helping neither (skipping the fight):** As Helping Ansbach, without the items.

locations.title: Thiollier
locations.description:
After taking St. Trina's poison 4 times she will respond after you die, when you respawn Thiollier will start talking. Once Thiollier is finished talking tell them what St. Trina told you, they will deny that you are the chosen giving you the option to tell them again. 
Once you told them again talk to them again and they will threaten you. Dying to St. Trina again will give more dialogue with her, once you respawn Thiollier will invade you.

You will get the [St. Trina's Smile](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381964) talisman from this

**Additional Enemies:**

- Hornsent: If [Hornsent's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387464) has been progressed until the last step. Drops [Hornsent's Armor](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387458) and [Falx](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387421).

**Potential Allies:**
- Sir Ansbach: If [Sir Ansbach's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387468) has been progressed until the last step, and you sided with him during [Leda's Questline (2nd battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381988)
- Sanguine Noble Nataan: If [Sir Ansbach's Questline](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=387468) has been progressed until the last step, and you skipped [Leda's Questline (2nd battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381988).

locations.title: Monk's Missive
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Pick up the note on the ground   
**Steps:**
1. Find the monk to the east at Moorth Ruins grace
2. Use the gesture "May the Best Win" and fight him 
3. Earn Dane's Hat and Dryleaf Arts

locations.title: Count Ymir's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Count Ymir  ](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381272)   
**Steps:**
1. Speak with [Count Ymir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381272), he will tell you to sound a bell after giving you a map which tells you its location and a Hole-Laden Necklace
2. Go to the [Hanging Bell](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382251) and sound the Bell
3. Return to [Ymir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381272), he will give you second ruins location and Talisman: Beloved Stardust.  
4. Sound the second bell in [Finger Ruins of Rhia](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382345)
5. Return to  [Ymir](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381272), talk with him and he will give you third ruins map.
6. Reload the area and interact with his throne to reveal a ladder down.
7. Sound the bell in the area below the ladder to be taken to the boss fight: [Mityr, Mother of Fingers](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382002), Defeat it and return to the Chapel
8. Approach the Throne and you will be invaded by Jolan, Defeating him summons Ymir as a boss.

locations.title: St. Trina's Quest
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak to [St. Trina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382315) after defeating the [Putrescent Knight](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381961)    
**Steps:**
1. Pick up the [St. Trina' Cookbook [3]](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382316) near [St. Trina](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382315) and craft a _Lulling Branch_  
2. Consume it then speak to St. Trina and "Imbibe Nectar" four times (and die)
3. Speak to St. Trina and "Imbibe Nectar" for the fifth time and get cutscene dialog
4. Speak to St. Trina and "Imbibe Nectar" for the sixth time and get cutscene dialog
5. Speak with [Thiollier](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381963) to progress his dialogue
6. Reload area and [Thiollier will invade](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382633).

locations.title: Needle Knight Leda's Questline
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Pick up the [Tower of Shadow Message](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=380804). You must have spoken to Leda before entering the Shadow Realm for the quest to properly trigger.  
**Steps:**
1. Read the [Castle Cross Message](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381194)
2. Speak to [Needle Knight Leda](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=380252)
3. Break the Great Rune; approach [Shadow Keep](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381342) until you get a game notification that "somewhere, a great rune has broken".
4. Speak with Needle Knight Leda again.
5. Complete [Leda's Questline (1st battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381987) (see the battle for choice repercussions)
6.  Speak with Needle Knight Leda to receive the [Lacerating Crossed-Tree](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=386478).
7. Complete [Leda's Questline (2nd battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381988) (see the battle for choice repercussions)
8. Speak with Needle Knight Leda to receive the [Retaliatory Crossed-Tree Talisman](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=386477).
9. Defeat [Needle Knight Leda](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=384098)

locations.title: Hornsent's Questline
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Redmane Freyja](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=380738).  
**Steps:**
1. Speak with [Hornsent](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=380739)
2. Speak with Horsent at his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=380254).
3. Break the Great Rune; approach [Shadow Keep](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381342) until you get a game notification that "somewhere, a great rune has broken".
4. Speak with Hornsent again.
5. Complete [Leda's Questline (1st battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381987) (see the battle for choice repercussions)
6. Summon Hornsent to battle [Messmer the Impaler](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381741).
7. Defeat Hornsent. either:
    - [As an invader](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382691);
    - As an ally of [Needle Knight Leda](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=384098)

locations.title: Sir Ansbach's Questline
locations.description:
**How to Begin:** Speak with [Sir Ansbach](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=380752)  
**Steps:**
1. Interact with the [Miquella's Cross](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382123)
2. Speak with Sir Ansbach again.
3. Break the Great Rune; approach [Shadow Keep](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381342) until you get a game notification that "somewhere, a great rune has broken".
4. Speak with Sir Ansbach in his [new location](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382217).
5. Read the [Storehouse Cross Message](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381713)
6. Speak with [Redmane Freyja](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=383036)
7. Speak with Ansbach again; he will give you a letter to give to Freyja.
8. Acquire the [Secret Rite Scroll](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381721)
9. Give the scroll to Ansbach.
10. Complete [Leda's Questline (2nd battle)](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=381988) (see the battle for each choice's outcomes).
11. Summon Ansbach against [Promised Consort Radahn](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=382044). If you do, you will receive [Ansbach's Set](https://mapgenie.io/elden-ring/maps/the-shadow-realm?locationIds=386515) after defeating him.

**Note:** Steps 6 and 7 are optional, but required for ??.
